local_intent: Perceive bread if needed, move above it by 0.05 m, align to it, and verify position before grasping.
assumptions: Bread is reachable and workspace is clear
Camera has line of sight for detection
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: detect (with retry), MoveAbove (0.05, 1200), align (tolerance 0.01), then verify position, matching the ordering and intent of the GLOBAL_BT and description.
